data.introduce: 该接口用于实现国内非自愿同舱改期确认，对应黑屏指令IRR。
data.functions: 该接口用于实现国内非自愿同舱改期确认功能，对应黑屏指令IRR，前序接口为A8或A11国内客票变更搜索。该接口请求中SerialNo字段依赖于A8或A11接口返回。
data.requestSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirInvoluntaryReissueRQ","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"非自愿同舱改期确认请求","children":[{"name":"POS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"？","children":[{"name":"Source","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"请求者信息","children":[{"name":"@PseudoCityCode","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Office号","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"FareParameters","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"搜索运价的结果信息","children":[{"name":"FareParameter","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"搜索运价的结果信息","children":[{"name":"PsgIndex","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"旅客序号，从1开始","children":[]},{"name":"SerialNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"第一步查询结果的运价序列号","children":[]},{"name":"AvBindingIndex","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"AvBindingIndex","children":[]},{"name":"Fp","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Fp","children":[]},{"name":"Involuntary","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"非自愿标识","children":[]},{"name":"TktNo","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"票号","children":[]},{"name":"CouponNumber","type":"int","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"设置要改期的航段在票面里的航段序号","children":[]},{"name":"PnrDisconnected","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"设置票航段与PNR是否已经失去关联","children":[]},{"name":"SplitPnr","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"是否分离PNR","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"NewPnr","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"新PNR","children":[]},{"name":"ToDeleteSegIndexes","type":"array","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"需要删除的旧航段序号","children":[{"name":"ToDeleteSegIndex","type":"int","quantity":"0..n","default":"","description":"需要删除的旧航段序号","children":[]}]},{"name":"IcsPnr","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"Ics PNR","children":[]},{"name":"SplitPnr","type":"boolean","quantity":"1","default":"false","description":"是否分离PNR，取值为true/false","children":[]}]}]
data.responseSchema: [{"name":"TES_AirInvoluntaryReissueRS","type":"object","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"非自愿同舱改期确认返回","children":[{"name":"Errors","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误信息","children":[{"name":"Error","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"","children":[{"name":"Trace","type":"array","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"错误详细描述或者内部异常信息","children":[{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"编码","children":[]},{"name":"@Text","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"文本","children":[]}]},{"name":"@Code","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误代码","children":[]},{"name":"@Type","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误类型","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortText","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误详细信息英文","children":[]},{"name":"@ShortTextZH","type":"string","quantity":"1","default":"","description":"错误详细信息中文","children":[]}]}]},{"name":"Result","type":"string","quantity":"0..1","default":"","description":"返回：返回，如OK","children":[]}]}]
